issue.title: The following packages have unmet dependencies:

content.raw:
This not a gazebo related bug. This is a problem you'll face when you have a corrupted package database, and/or some packages weren't installed properly.
Follow this link for information on how to solve the issue.

https://askubuntu.com/questions/140246/how-do-i-resolve-unmet-dependencies-after-adding-a-ppa
content.html:
This not a gazebo related bug. This is a problem you'll face when you have a corrupted package database, and/or some packages weren't installed properly. Follow this link for information on how to solve the issue.
